item.title: 20170308graphicalmodel2
item.description: Bayes Networks Directed graph: edges have directions Directed acyclic graph: contains no directed cycle Define: >Bayes Network is a DAG, G(V,E).For each vetex $v \in V$, there is a random variable $xv$ and the joint distribution $P{X_v}$ of the set of all random variable . $P(XV)=\prod{v \in V}P(Xv|X{Pa(v)})$ Remark: There is another subtle constistency d-seperation Factor Graph
